articles.description: On April 1, 2023, at the Atal Bihari Vajpayee Ekana Stadium in Lucknow, KL Rahul will lead the Lucknow Super Giants in their opening match of the Indian Premier League 2023 against the Delhi Capitals.
articles.content: KL Rahul (capt), Avesh Khan, Ayush Badoni, Quinton de Kock (wk), K Gowtham, Deepak Hooda, Prerak Mankad, Kyle Mayers, Amit Mishra, Mohsin Khan, Naveen-ul-Haq, Krunal Pandya, Nicholas Pooran (wk), Rav… [+166 chars]

articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.title: Shikhar Dhawan failed to see the red flags in his marriage with Ayesha Mukherjee; How can one identify hidden red flags in a relationship? - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: Red flags can be very subtle or difficult to identify in a toxic relationship. No matter how much you love the person, it is important to understand that the negativity and toxicity of existing red flags in a relationship can ruin you.
articles.content: In a recent interview, Indian cricketer Shikhar Dhawan opened up about his failed marriage with Aesha Mukherjee where he stressed how important it is to identify ‘red flags’ in any relationship. Shik… [+565 chars]
